Planet Lulu Band – The Ultimate Tribute To The ‘60s
Boca Raton
What springs to mind when you think about youth and pop culture from the 1960s? Planet Lulu Band brings it all back to life with this extraordinary show. The Summer of Love, the British Invasion and Woodstock figure prominently in this tribute to the era. The band performs the best dance tunes of the ‘60s, embodying the original spirit and ...

Viva Brazil! With Brazilian Big Band Gafieira Rio Miami
Pembroke Pines
Let’s go to Rio with the tropical sounds of Sergio Mendes and Antonio Carlos Jobim! Enjoy classics like Waters of March and The Girl from Ipanema performed by Gafieira Rio Miami, an 11-piece big band led by Latin Grammy winner Diogo Brown. With lively samba percussion, swinging horns, the beautiful voice of Isa Duarte and sensational dancers, the band fuses ...

West Palm Beach
Not many artists are brave or talented enough to take on the divas of soul, but Crystal Stark is a cut above. She pays tribute to legendary icons Donna Summer, Diana Ross and Whitney Houston, who had enormous hits like Bad Girls, MacArthur Park, Touch Me In The Morning, Love Hangover, Greatest Love Of All and I Will Always Love ...

Winter Wonderland Starring Chris Ruggiero
Boca Raton
Often described as an old soul, Chris Ruggiero has a uniquely classic style that harkens back to the early days of rock ‘n roll and pop-rock. Capturing all of the warmth and nostalgia of the most wonderful time of the year, this festive show features a live, five-piece band backing Chris up as he sings seasonal classics, as well as ...

Soundsations Band
Boca Raton
This South Florida band always brings the party by playing high-energy dance music from the 1960s through the 1980s. It’s made up of singers and musicians who, over the span of their individual careers, have opened for such major recording artists as The Rolling Stones, Percy Sledge, The Young Rascals, and The Five Satins. Each member contributes their own talent ...

Love Rolls On Starring Susan Winter
Pembroke Pines
This multi-award winning singer performs classics by Arlen, Bernstein, Gershwin and Berlin from The Great American Songbook, as well as soon-to-be-standards by contemporary songwriters Carroll Coates, Susan Werner and Dave Frishberg. Along with exploring themes of love lost, found and everlasting, she creates even more tender moments when she brings her parents’ WWII love letters to life in song. To ...
